duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine tests and testing activities, generating detailed reports.
Troubleshoot manufacturing & component problems to the lowest Line Replaceable Unit (LRU), and support during qualification tests.
Execute tests according to test procedures and schematics, redlining test procedures as required.
Demonstrate good working knowledge and experience with the use of computers, data recorders, and various measurement instruments.
Read and understand schematics and wire lists, while maintaining technician safety awareness during tests.
Document and report any anomaly or failure during test execution, optimize test execution and troubleshoot electrical issues.
Support mechanical installations and repairs on rail vehicles as directed by Supervisor, including electrical panel installation and termination.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent Required
